article_title: Aid worker attack 'really hard to stomach', says charity.
sentence: Earlier,  we  reported  a  second  humanitarian  organisation  in  Gaza  -  the  American  Near  East  Refugee  Aid  (Anera)  -  has  also  paused  operations,  along  with  the  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK),  following  last  night's  Israeli  air  strike  which  killed  seven  aid  workers.
